header.title: Invite A Friend
header.description:
Invite A Friend is a phpBB3 Modification, which adds referral and invitation features to the phpBB board in order to have more influence on the registration process and increase the number of users.
This can either be accomplished by specifying a referral user or sending out invitations with a referral key attached. The referral key cannot only be required to make your board invitation-only but also helps to associate new users with the referring one adding a more social component to the phpBB board. Supporting Ultimate Points and Cash Mod.
header.author-notes: Update instructions from previous releases can be found within the contrib/updates folder. For further information and bug reports please visit http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=70&t=1224005

[Fixed] SQL error when adding new bots

action-group.diy-instructions:
When you are done with the file changes, please run the installation file at BOARD_URL/install/invitation.php (If you are using AutoMOD 1.0, you can follow the installer link above)
Delete the 'install' folder afterwards, go to your Administrator Control Panel and be sure that the settings and permissions added during the installation are as desired. Have fun.
Note: You might want to install the templates for subsilver2 style or another language package as well. Related instructions are included in the contrib/templates or contrib/languages folder.
